    • login

      public void login(int id) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.AlreadyLogedInException
      User logs in a with an ID. If the id is not in the data already gathered, a new object Usuari is created.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.AlreadyLogedInException - Thrown if a current session is already open.

    • loginAdmin

      public void loginAdmin() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.AlreadyLogedInException
      Logs in as an admin.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.AlreadyLogedInException - Thrown if a session is already opened.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out either if you loged in as a user or as an admin.

      Gets the active user identifier.
      Returns:
      The active user identifier.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - When the user is not loged in as a user.

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Determines if the current session has admin privilages.
      Returns:
      True if admin, False otherwise.

    • loadSession

      public void loadSession(String directory) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException, src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Loads a session/project. The Recomanacions, Usuaris and Items set are initialized, as well as all the other extra informations stored. Fist, all the previous data is erased.
      Parameters:
      directory - The directory where the files are stored
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - There's some data not correct in some file.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotFoundException - Thrown when de directory is not found in the folder system.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Thrown when the folder contains faulty files or has some missing.

    • createSession

      public void createSession(String projName, String itemsFile, String usersFile) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException
      Creates a new session/project from a items file and a ratings file. All the other constants are either calculated from the input data or set with default values. Fist, all the previous data is erased.
      Parameters:
      projName - The project name
      itemsFile - The items file
      usersFile - The users file
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if either the items or users file was not found.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FileNotValidException - Thrown if the file has missing information or has not the right structure.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Thrown if the current folder has missing files.

    • createEmptySession

      public void createEmptySession(String projName, ArrayList<String> nomsAtriubts, ArrayList<String> tipusAtriubtsS) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException, src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Creates a new session without any initial data input. Fist, all the previous data is erased.
      Parameters:
      projName - The project name
      nomsAtriubts - The item atribute names
      tipusAtriubtsS - The item atribute types
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Problems with the initialization of the static values of Item
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Thrown if the current folder has missing files.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - Thrown if there are problems with the atirubute type assignation.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - You need to be an admin to perform this functionallity.

    • saveSession

      public void saveSession() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException
      Saves all the information of the current session/project.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Thrown if there are problems with the project directory.

    • runTest

      public ArrayList<String> runTest() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Function designed to obtain the DCG and NDCG values for avaluating the performance of the algorithm. The Unknown and Known test files are used as well as the basic items and rating files. The test is run with the K and algorithm values that are assigned at the moment.
      Returns:
      The DCG and NDCG(has a percentage) in this order in a ArrayList
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Thrown in a very specific case where the Q value can't be assignet due to a lack of user.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.FolderNotValidException - Thrown if there are problems when getting the information from the Unknown and Known files.

    • getAllItems

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>> getAllItems()
      Returns all the items in the current set of items(without the header).
      Returns:
      All the atributes of all the items structured with ArrayLists.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemIdNotValidException - There is already an item with the same id

    • setValoracio

      public void setValoracio(String itemId, String usuariId, String rating) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException, src.recomanador.excepcions.RecommendationNotFoundException, src.recomanador.excepcions.RatingNotValidException
      Sets a rating for a recommendation.
      Parameters:
      itemId - The item identifier of the recommendation
      usuariId - The usuari identifier of the recommendation
      rating - The new rating
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - If the user is loged in as a user, it can only modify his recommendations.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.RatingNotValidException - The rating is not valid.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.RecommendationNotFoundException - The item and user has no relation as a recommendation.

    • createRecomanacions

      public void createRecomanacions() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException
      Main functionality of this project. It generates recommendations for the current user from all the other information. This calculations are performed in the algorithm controller.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - You need to be loged in as a user to perform this functionallity.

    • getQ

      public String getQ() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException

      Returns:
      The value Q
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - You need to be an admin to perform this functionallity.

    • getAlgorisme

      public String getAlgorisme() throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException
      Gets the value that specifies which algorithm to run. These are the following options: 0 - collaborative filtering(Kmeans + Slope1) 1 - content-based filtering(KNN) 2 - hybrid approaches
      Returns:
      The value
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - You need to be an admin to perform this functionallity.

    • setK

      public void setK(String k) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException, src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException

      Parameters:
      k - The new value as a string
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.PrivilegesException - You need to be an admin to perform this functionallity.
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - The value entered is not valid.

      Sets the value that specifies which algorithm to run. These are the following options: 0 - collaborative filtering(Kmeans + Slope1) 1 - content-based filtering(KNN) 2 - hybrid approaches

      Throws:
